si.title: සහනාධාරය රු.. 25,000 ක් දක්වා වැඩි වීම

en.title: The subsidy is Rs.. An increase of up to 25,000
body_lines: President Anura Kumara Dissanayake has directed the Treasury to increase the fertilizer relief from October 01 to Rs. 15,000 to Rs.

summary_lines: Here's a summary of the text in approximately 200 characters:
Sri Lanka: President Anura Kumara Dissanayake orders Treasury to raise fertilizer subsidy from Oct 1st. Increase from Rs. 15,000 to Rs. 20,000 (up to Rs. 25,000).
